status.1: Lawful Good - Believes in righteousness and order.
status.2: Neutral Good - Does the best without being ordered or chaotic.
status.3: Chaotic Good - Values freedom and kindness.
status.4: Lawful Neutral - Values order, tradition, or a personal code.
status.5: True Neutral - Sees balance in all things.
status.6: Chaotic Neutral - Values personal freedom above all.
status.7: Lawful Evil - Takes what they want through authority.
status.8: Neutral Evil - Wants to maximize personal benefit.
status.9: Chaotic Evil - Takes what they want through force.

fixed_attributes.background: Grew up in a bustling city
fixed_attributes.relationship_with_protagonist: Old companion with a shared history
